question: In the service-profit chain model, there is a(n) ________ relationship between employee satisfaction and employee turnover.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. A parallel relationship between employee satisfaction and employee turnover would mean that, as one increases or decreases, so does the other.
That’s not correct. An equivalent relationship between employee satisfaction and employee turnover would mean that, as one increases, so does the other.
That’s not correct. The service-profit chain model does not set forth a behavioral relationship between employee satisfaction and employee turnover.
According to the service-profit chain model, employee satisfaction is inversely related to employee turnover (i.e., an increase in employee satisfaction results in a decrease in turnover).

detailedSolution: According to the service-profit chain model, employee satisfaction is inversely related to employee turnover (i.e., an increase in employee satisfaction results in a decrease in turnover).
